titleStmt.title: Dialling performed instrumentally by our hemisphere in plane projected and first fitted by Mr. William Oughtred and laid down according to his method formerly published for this very subject : together with twentie one several diagrams or schemes demonstratively shewing the reason and ground-work of all dialling as also how to know, distinguish and set down the hour-lines for both faces of all planes at one working / by a practitioner in the same art.
titleStmt.author: Oughtred, William, 1575-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William du-Gard and are to bee sold by William Hope,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The art of dialling.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
